-spec minimum_steps(S :: unicode:unicode_binary()) -> integer().
minimum_steps(S) ->
    List = binary_to_list(S),
    TotalBlack = length([X || X <- List, X == $1]),
    {Steps, _, _} = lists:foldl(fun(Elem, {Acc, Pos, BlackToLeft}) ->
                                     case Elem of
                                         $0 -> {Acc, Pos + 1, BlackToLeft};
                                         $1 -> {Acc + Pos - BlackToLeft, Pos + 1, BlackToLeft + 1}
                                     end
                                 end, {0, 0, 0}, List),
    Steps - TotalBlack * (TotalBlack - 1) div 2.
